attributes.action: Keep the Blackburn care home in sheerness open
attributes.additional_details: Look into repairing the water problem to ensure the elderly residents can stay
attributes.background: Look into the reason for closing this home as it is the only KCC  funded home in the area

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local authority managed care homes are a matter for individual local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
